Reviews.Title: eh phone!
Reviews.Author: Lalalove
Reviews.Content: i gotta say this phone is extremely durable! i am a verrrrrry clumsy cell phone user, i drop everything, i have broken over 4 phones and an ipod! this phone fell off of a roller coaster and nothing happened to it. the touch is a bit crappy and slow, it freezes a little but if you buy this as a what ever phone to just abuse than this is the phone to buy. when it fell out of my pocket at 6 flags i was on the superman ride (extremely fast) i only had on it a screen protector that i bought from the $ store (i cut it to fit the screen) NOTHING HAPPENED TO IT.

Reviews.Title: A Great Phone
Reviews.Author: jiexu523
Reviews.Content: I am a light user of smart phone. I only use it when waiting for my daughter at swimming class, dance class, etc. So I don't even have a data plan. I use only Wi-Fi to connect to internet. This phone is great for me, having Wi-Fi, not expensive, easy to carry and use.Although the screen is only 3", but it is OK to me. Anyway I am not spending a lot time on it.I also like the look of this phone. Somehow I feel the white color is too femine to me (I am a guy). So I bought a black silicon case, and works great for me!
